name: Literary Arts
description: Poetry, fiction, drama, and the written word — from ancient epic to contemporary novel, the art of storytelling on the page.

name: Performing Arts
description: Music, theater, dance, and film — the arts that unfold in time, from classical symphony to cinema to hip-hop.

name: Visual Arts
description: Painting, sculpture, photography, and design — from cave walls to digital screens, the art of making meaning visible.
